thread.title_full: Full Version Free Video Cutter Software

title: Full Version Free Video Cutter Software
text: Full Version Free Video Cutter Software , 10 September 2015 -- This Video Cutter has very few options - you can choose the output format, but there are no quality settings. It is easy to use - a couple of clicks to finish video cutting. Free to use - 100% free to download, install and use, no watermark, no extra fee. Convert video formats - Convert video formats after cutting video. Cut audio from video - Rip and cut the audio data from your video file. Preview video - Preview the original video file or the video clips selected. There is also no sound in AllPepole Video Cutter, so you have to make your cut just using images. Sound will be kept for your edited video, and you just can hear it in the app itself. Ironically, you can set the output to MP3 and convert the sound from your video! AllPepole Video Cutter would be improved if you could import DVDs too, but is nevertheless a very easy to use program ideal for cutting video for YouTube etc. AllPepole Video Cutter supports the following formats: MPEG 1/2, MPEG4, DivX, Xvid, AVI, WMV, Quicktime MOV, Flash video, MP3 and so on. Know more about Allpepole Video Merger at Mac APP store:
